step_feedback.feedback: Good job bringing your arms in and making fists. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
Your arms extended well, but try to relax your muscles more as you exhale. Focus on opening your fingers wide.
You're doing great opening your fingers. Keep relaxing your muscles as you exhale and extend your arms.
Good extension of your arms. Ensure you are fully relaxing your muscles and exhaling completely.
You're extending your arms well. Focus on fully relaxing your muscles and opening your fingers wide as you exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the arm movements. Remember to fully open your fingers and relax your muscles as you exhale. Keep up the great work on the repetitions!
